<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add repeated timer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/timer/repeated/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add an Repeated Timer by (optionally) an Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the Repeated Timer"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the reminder","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"Message the reminder sends","type":"string"},"dayInterval":{"description":"Day interval between the reminders are sent","type":"integer"},"time":{"description":"Time of day this reminder should go off","type":"object","properties":{"hour":{"type":"integer"},"minute":{"type":"integer"}}},"startTime":{"description":"First day of this reminder (used for day intervals)","type":"object","properties":{"year":{"type":"integer"},"month":{"type":"integer"},"day":{"type":"integer"}}}},"title":"repeatedReminder"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
